TextBlock.Text: Our latest invention: the Handheld Cactus Teleporation Device.
Simply walk up to a cactus that you wish to relocate, and press the button on the device. You will then be prompted with a list of known co-ordinates.
Select your desired cactus destination, and the cactus will be teleported directly to that location, blink-and-you'll-miss-it quick!

New co-ordinates can be programmed into the cactus teleportation device at any time using a proprietary format. For converting co-ordinates to the required format, please consult a trained cactus professional.
Disclaimer: Cactus Teleporation Device may not work on cacti originating from outside our star system.
